name: Brissa Jensen
text: We used to eat Mountain Mike's Pizza in Paradise, CA before the 2018 Campfire. We've been craving some bomb pizza for awhile so when I found a location 1.5hr from our new home I decided to drive out for some great pizza. I forgot to call ‚Ä¶More

name: jennifer celis
text: My first time trying Mountain Mikes and I'm sorry to say that the food was DISGUSTING!!... I ordered 2 large pepperoni pizzas 1 with Jalapeno's and received 2 pepperoni pizzas but paid for the jalapeno topping. I also ordered 12 pc wings ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Guerrero
text: Usually a great experience but beware if you order the boneless wings. Some of them were crumbs this time.

name: Johnnyb good
text: Totally amazing, from the crust to the sauce and i have not seen Canadian bacon in a pizza for years. Please don't be afraid to bring the family  with you. Heads up Worning: your family will be there for a while longer than you want to be. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kari Glass
text: Love this place. My mom & I ordered boneless wings today we were not given plastic utensils and were not offered or asked if we needed any. When we asked, the employee said they didn't have any. If they don't have utensils at least tell us before we order. Not everyone eats pizza. C'mon guys...what's the deal?!

name: Annmarie Episcopo
text: We ordered a thick crust meat lovers pizza....there was so much grease in the box it leaked through the box onto my pants.  The pizza was also thin crust and overcooked. The toppings literally fell off the pizza and the pepperoni was burnt.

name: shawna
text: I'm so happy that they opened a Mountain Mike's pizzeria out here in Menifee, CA. Mountain Mike's pizzeria has great Pizza! I personally love their all you can eat Lunch special with pizza & salad bar. They also offer the all your can eat ‚Ä¶More

name: Kari Streeter
text: Food is delicious, the staff is very attentive and the portions are good. You get a lot for what you pay for.. worth every penny.

name: JASMIN BOURBIN
text: Paid $60 for our order and it was delivered cold and missing ingredients on both pizzas. Called and got a "yeah sorry we ran out." Was offered 10% off our next order. NO THANKS!! we will stick with Marcos pizza from now on. Lesson learned!

name: Kraig Kiker
text: At last! This pizza place got it right. Their pizza is amazing! Their other menu items follow suit. They have top-notch employees. Please, open another restaurant closer to northern Menifee near all the new houses going in near the Sun City community.

name: Tom McGee
text: The pizza is pretty good. I would say the pizzas are not on the cheap side but the ingredients were fresh. They had 3 video games for the kids and a couple screens running sports. I would say this is a nice clean restaurant but didn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Peter Luther King
text: Staff is friendly. Prices are sky high. $20 for a 14" large one topping.  Sports bar atmosphere.

name: Robert Negrete
text:
Their hours are totally off. Says closes at 10 p.m. I called at 830 they said they are closed.
Went down there just to confirm, it is open. It was just a bunch of teenagers ‚Ä¶More

name: Colleen Ashton
text: Beware of health and safety standards! NO ONE preparing the pizzas/food was wearing gloves or masks...touching food with their bare hands! Gross!! We walked out for our own safety after voicing our complaint to the girl behind the counter. That's totally unsanitary.

name: Jacqueline Houts
text: Food was delicious. The salad bar had a nice variety and was fresh. The staff were all so friendly and helpful. A little bit pricey but worth it!

name: Jennifer Gieseman
text: Oh wow loved this place. The pizza crust was so yummy

name: Juan Garcia
text: Great pizza, but not the people bringing the food to you they seem kind of lazy and they gave us the wrong pizza, the place was busy but no one was cleaning tables or stocking supplies for the tables. I was disappointed dinning in with my ‚Ä¶More

name: kimberly halas
text: Not bad but over priced.. Papa Johns is down the street and has stepped their game up.

name: Fuzzys Habitual Health Hut
text: Mountain mikes is awesome! Really cool people REALLY good pizza. Best pizza in menifee!

name: Scott Thomas
text: Typically Mountain Mike's pizza is Excellent had a bad experience this last time. Called in two pizzas and someone lost a ticket on one of them. So one was ready. And the other one  hadn't been started. So I had a semi warm pizza  offered nothing. Not even a drink while waiting. For the other pizza, so kind of disappointed.

name: Oscar Gutz
text: The weakest pizza ever had $20 you got to be kidding me

name: Louie Mouneu
text: Pizza and wing are awesome great place for hanging with family or friends

name: Rocco Harriman
text: The pizza and wings are 10/10 super good food!!!

name: HVACrandy
text: Best üçï in Menifee. My favorite is the McKinley. Always get my delivery within 30-40 min and pizza is hot, not this 1 hour b.s. for warm soggy pizza from other places.

name: Cynthia Norris
text:
Ordered with coupon to give your place a try.
Cashier had to be told my name several times. Pizza was not even hot by time got home only few minutes away.Greasy pizzas hardly any meat on them. Will Not be back. Yuck

name: JOHN LEDESMA
text: Buffet is very mediocre for the price. Basically pizza and salad.  Oh yeah and a small drink cup so you have to get up several times on your visit there. They did replenish the pizza (small pizzas) but took a long time to do so. Once it was ‚Ä¶More

name: kurtis anderson
text: I have had pizza all over the world and the reason I'm going to go ack to Mountain Mike's is because of their pepperoni. It is incredible.

name: Chris Kagay
text: Pizza done right. Gluten free is also really good.

name: MoM_e_ Ka_dosh
text: Not a variety of pizzas offered at the buffet. We also had to wait on them to bring out fresh pizzas. The flavors are there though. Good tasting pizza I was just disappointed at the buffet. Salad bar was good and place is clean. The girl ‚Ä¶More

name: Sandy Loeb
text: Great pizzas for a good price

name: RAUL DIAZ
text: Medium meat lovers pizza was very good. The boneless wings not so much. I would buy their pizza again.

name: David Light
text: Great pizza üëå    really good flavor and the crust is crispy.   Been back several times since.

name: paul medina

name: Christina Avila
text: Ask to have pizza extra crispy!  Love the little crisp pepperoni.

name: David Adair
text: They are over priced and the manager is an idiot. Gl ppl

name: Krysta Meyers
text: All you can eat pizza and salad bar was good, service was good... No complaints.

name: chappi 1436
text: Good pizza, lunch buffet was awesome, only deducted a star because its a little pricey for pizza.  That being said if your looking for pizza that is better than the typical delivery places (pizzahut, dominos, papajohns etc...) this is where I would go.

name: Laura Calderon
text: Great pizza, great salad bar with a huge selection. Good beers too.

name: Christine Pouliot-Basnar
text: WOW!  We have so many bland, average pizza joint in Menifee that you just wanna skip the traditional "Pizza Friday" with the family it's just too blah.  I have a terminal illness and don't get it much, that's why I PRAY they deliver to my ‚Ä¶More

name: Margaret Nightengale
text: The very best tasting pizza! Fresh ingredients and the dough was perfection.

name: Super_Gonk_ Droid
text: Pizza good but very limited and you can't taste garlic on the breadstick :( Needs to have riceroni here.

name: Alectroshocker
text: They are a bit pricey and the pizzas are weirdly cut, but other than that the pizza was fantastic, very flavorful and filling. They do takeout, delivery, and sit in. They also have a lunch buffet if you‚Äôre interested in that.

name: Papa Dan the Uber and Lyft man

name: Lisa Tozier
text: We went to celebrate a birthday.  The pizza and cheese bread was really good.

name: Jeff LaLonde
text: Pizza dough was firm and crisp not soggy and had a good ratio of dough to toppings. Price is right. They did not have garlic bread and ran out but service was great.

name: David Brown
text: Very nice place.  Tried the wings- pretty good.   The garlic sticks were disappointing.

name: Lara Tith
text: That's a good pie! Enjoyed our stop.

name: Jesus Lovato
text: The food was fire!!!! Meaning excellent and the customer service was great we have found our new pizza spot

name: Samantha Fonseca

text: They do not have anchovies, in spite of  being listed as an  ingredient on the menu.  Otherwise Ok!

text: Limited food for the buffet. Poor service. Not coming here again. Chick that was workin there had a attitude and Struggled to bring  pizza and breadsticks at the buffet.

text: Always good pizza and a nice selection a the salad bar. My only complaint is the salad plates are so small
